dust_off_fixed_leg.description: Dust off any accumulated particles on the fixed leg.

inspect_fixed_leg_status.description: Inspect the fixed leg of the pliers for any wear and tear.

scrub_fixed_leg.description: Scrub the fixed leg of the pliers to remove any residual material.

observe_fixed_leg_after_cleaning.description: Inspect the fixed leg of the pliers after cleaning it.

inspect_fixed_leg.description: Inspect the fixed leg of the pliers without making any changes.

inspect_fixed_leg_again.description: Perform a second inspection on the fixed leg of the pliers without making any changes.

rotate_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the pliers to check its movement.

dust_off_and_rotate_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the pliers and check its rotation by twisting it back and forth.

ensure_proper_rotation_leg.description: Ensure the revolute leg of the pliers is in the right position by rotating it.

adjust_revolute_leg.description: Adjust the revolute leg of the pliers to ensure proper functioning.

clean_and_adjust_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the pliers and ensure proper rotation by twisting it back and forth.

secure_revolute_leg.description: Secure the revolute leg of the pliers to ensure it is in the right position

check_revolute_leg.description: Perform routine check on the revolute leg of the pliers by wiping and rotating.

maintain_revolute_leg.description: Maintain the revolute leg of the pliers by cleaning and verifying its rotation.

check_revolute_leg_rotation.description: Check the rotation of the revolute leg of the pliers by just rotating it.

clean_revolute_leg.description: Clean the revolute leg of the pliers by wiping.

evaluate_pliers.description: Evaluate the overall condition of the pliers with a thorough inspection.

overall_maintenance_of_pliers.description: Perform maintenance on the pliers by dusting both legs and checking the rotation of the revolute leg.

monitor_pliers.description: Observe the overall condition of the pliers without making any changes.

service_pliers.description: Service the pliers by adjusting revolute leg and cleaning both legs.

scrub_entire_pliers.description: Scrub both legs of the pliers for thorough cleaning.

sharpen_legs_pliers.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the pliers repeatedly to simulate sharpening it, and clean both legs.

inspect_after_servicing.description: Check the pliers after servicing to ensure both legs are in proper condition.

check_pliers.description: Check the overall condition of the pliers by inspecting both legs.

maintain_pliers.description: Maintain the pliers by cleaning and checking both legs.

clean_pliers.description: Thoroughly clean both legs of the pliers to ensure smooth operation.

secure_pliers.description: Secure both legs of the pliers to ensure they are in the right position.

wipe_fixed_leg.description: Wipe the fixed leg of the pliers for regular maintenance.

wipe_revolute_leg.description: Wipe the revolute leg of the pliers to ensure smooth operation.

rotate_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the pliers to check its movement.

maintain_whole_pliers.description: Wipe and rotate both legs of the pliers for overall maintenance.

clean_movable_leg.description: Clean the movable leg of the pliers to ensure smooth movement.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the pliers.

rotate_movable_leg.description: Rotate the movable leg of the pliers for using.

clean_whole_pliers.description: Clean the entire pliers， including the movable and fixed leg.

check_pliers_again.description: Perform a second check on the overall condition of the pliers by inspecting both legs.

maintain_pliers_condition.description: Maintain the condition of the pliers by cleaning and adjusting both legs.

clean_pliers_legs.description: Thoroughly clean both legs of the pliers to ensure smooth operation.

secure_pliers_legs.description: Secure both legs of the pliers to ensure they are in the right position.

wipe_revolute_leg.description: Wipe the revolute leg of the pliers to remove any dirt or dust.

rotate_revolute_leg.description: Rotate the revolute leg of the pliers to ensure its smooth functioning.

clean_fixed_leg.description: Clean the fixed leg of the pliers to remove any dirt or dust.

observe_fixed_leg.description: Observe the fixed leg of the pliers without making any changes.

wipe_all_pliers_legs.description: Clean both legs of the pliers for overall maintenance.

rotate_and_observe_pliers_legs.description: Rotate the revolute leg and observe the fixed leg of the pliers to understand their functionality.
